title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Breaking 25 years of tech debt using AWS Transform for .NET (MAM410)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform for .NET 解决 25 年技术债务 (MAM410)
abstract: Discover how organizations are accelerating modernization of their legacy .NET Framework applications by up to 4x using AWS Transform. This session explores how Idemia, a leading identity solutions provider in the US, addressed 25 years of technical debt by using AWS Transform for modernizing their legacy .NET Framework applications to cross-platform .NET. We'll showcase AWS Transform's latest .NET features and share practical insights on maintaining business continuity during modernization of mission-critical applications.
abstract_cn: 了解组织如何使用AWS Transform将其传统.NET Framework应用程序的现代化速度提升多达4倍。本次会议探讨了美国领先的身份解决方案提供商Idemia如何使用AWS Transform将其传统.NET Framework应用程序现代化为跨平台.NET，从而解决了25年的技术债务。我们将展示AWS Transform的最新.NET功能，并分享在关键业务应用程序现代化过程中保持业务连续性的实用见解。
